text: Sarani kare wa itta. `Musuko-tachi yo,(machi ni hairu toki wa mina ga) 1tsu no mon kara haitte wa naranai. Anata gata wa betsubetsu no mon kara hairi nasai.Daga (kono yojin wa), arra ni taishite wa, anata gata ni nani mo yakudatanaidearou. Saitei wa, tada arra ni zokusuru. Kare ni watashi wa shinrai shita. Subete no tayoru mono wa, kare ni koso tayorubekidearu
